description: A simple pair of earrings made of string and wooden beads.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A homemade bracelet crafted from colorful knickknacks.  It's not very expensive, but it's the effort that makes it special.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A medal awarded for achieving third place in some event.  It might be worth something if it was made of bronze; this one is made from iron.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Fake teeth inlaid with diamonds, worn over the teeth.  Fits horribly, but looks very shiny.  For that high-class gangsta rap look.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Fake teeth inlaid with garnets, worn over the teeth.  It looks very shiny.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A barrette with lots of ornaments.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A gold ring with a sparkling diamond mounted on top of it.  Back in the old days this could be worth a fortune.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A staple accessory for gentlemen.  Keeps your shirt collar in place and provides a more aesthetically pleasing arc to your necktie.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of copper earrings.  It's pretty heavy.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A hairpin made from copper.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A circular, copper locket.  It's been tarnished with use, and has gained some dull green spots.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A plain, copper ring.  Not very shiny, and not very popular.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

An unmarked, pair of silver cufflinks.  Cufflinks are used to secure the cuffs of dress shirts - a must-have for men in formal wear.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

An expensive pair of silver cufflinks, stylized with detailed overlays of gold gears and fractal patterns.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Those round things people plug into their earlobes as earrings, also called "ear plug" or "ear spool."  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Fake golden teeth, worn over the teeth.  Fits horribly, but looks very shiny.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of shiny gold earrings.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A gold hairpin, designed by the rich, for the rich.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A heart-shaped, gold locket with a frame inside to store photographs or small objects.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A medal awarded for achieving first place in some event.  Before everything fell apart, this could be a source of pride for its owner.  Now it's just another shiny bauble.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A flashy gold ring.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A fancy silver tie clip, a great match for your skinny tie.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of beautiful silver earrings.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A small relic from a forgotten saint.  As extraordinary as the world has become it may have some power yet.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A necklace made of fine gold chain bearing the symbol of a forgotten faith.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple necklace representing a religious faith.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A hand-crafted jade brooch of Oriental origin.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Fake platinum-and-silver teeth.  They may be cheaper than fake gold teeth, but they're much more rare.  Fits horribly, but looks very shiny.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A pair of plain platinum earrings - if gold is getting boring, just use another rare metal.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

The ultimate in esoteric, metal hair accessories, this hairpin is made from pure platinum.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A small, platinum locket for storing photographs or other small objects.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A platinum ring, engraved with all manner of swirls and spirals.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

This ring is an intricate gold band, with a small cluster of diamonds set in the center.  Before the world broke down, this ring would've cost a small fortune.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Also known as a promise ring, this ring is worn as a sign of chastity.  This one bears the inscription, "Love is patient."  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A gold and silver ring with a wide stamp attached to the band.  A long time ago, the stamp was legible, but now the pattern is too worn to discern its former use.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A flawless ring, ensnaring a diamond with twists of pure gold.  It's a constant reminder that the wearer is married.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A shiny, silver hairpin with a tiny bee engraved onto it.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A small, silver locket with a frame inside to store photographs or small objects.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A medal awarded for achieving second place in some event.  Before everything fell apart, this could be a source of pride for its owner.  Now it's just another shiny bauble.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A simple, silver ring.  You can wear it if you like, but it won't provide any effects.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A fuzzy tawny tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic.  Sways behind you when you walk.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A glossy black leather tail weighted down with tiny beads of plastic.  Sways behind you when you walk.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
